hotels.title: Malaysia: Vibrant Melaka Escape Overlooking Waterfront with Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Set on the waterfront of the sparkling Strait of Malacca, Holiday Inn Melaka, an IHG Hotel’s pristine location offers impressive views and proximity to exciting shopping districts and man-made attractions. Take in picturesque views from the relaxing vantage point of the infinity pool, indulge in a Balinese-inspired rejuvenation session at Tea Tree Spa and treat the tastebuds to a culinary splendour at Es.Sense Kitchen or Sirocco Italian Restaurant.
